resources.string: Could not publish party to wi-fi. Your friends can still connect but only using explicit connections.
Looks like someone is connected. If you continue, I will have to stop communicating.\n\nDo you want to go back to main menu?
Cannot open communication so your friend\'s devices can connect. This is very serious and prevents anything from working.
Failed to get network information. This isn\'t really a problem but you\'ll have to find this device network address in some other way in case your friends need explicit connection data.
Looks like Network Service Discovery is unavailable. This functionality is required.
File exists but cannot be read. This is unlikely to happen by accident so you\'re better check your system is fine.
party version 0 should have never been saved.
party %1$d clashes with %2$d, both are named \"%3$s\".
party key %1$d clashes with %2$d, both are named \"%3$s\" and have the same key!
failed to output data serialization, that was not supposed to happen and needs further investigation.
could not get an output stream to save new party definitions. This was not supposed to happen.
Failed to write new party definitions. Maybe you are just low on storage?
Cannot save new data. Old data refused to go away.
Oh no! New data was successfully stored but couldn\'t be given its real name and old data is already gone!\nFile:\n %1$s
Found two actors with the same ID.
Actor at least twice in a round.
Actor got an initiative but it should not be fighting!
Failed to load already existing data. New data will not be saved to preserve previous contents. Details: %1$s
Party saved to internal storage. Do you want to go adventuring right away?
Empty party saved to internal storage. We\'re going back to main menu now.
Could not store new party data. Error: %1$s
failed to delete previous contents, new data will be discarded to maintain the old.
Failed to rename new data to override old. Old data storage has been destroyed but data itself is preserved.
Searching for parties. Found parties will appear below.
You will advance to next step automatically as soon as the party is formed.
Lost connection to party \"%1$s\", reason given: %2$s.
Message too long. It might be displayed partially or not at all. Next time, fit the budget!
Found a party, but it is not being formed. Discarding.
Found a party but master wants to verify key and I don\'t know what to do. Discarding.
The information you need can be found on Master device. There\'s a menu option.
Could not send HELLO to host. System message:\n%1$s
This does not look like a valid port number. Ports are usually between 1024 and 65535. Try again.
Unable to connect to the specified host. Make sure you\'re specifying a valid host and the host is reachable (\'thethering\' will help). Try again.
Loaded party owner data is version %1$d. Current version is %2$d so data should be upgraded but no upgrading is possible yet. Continue at your own risk.
Loaded client data is version %1$d. Current version is %2$d so data should be upgraded but no upgrading is possible yet. Continue at your own risk.
Could not set up the service. Try again after rebooting.
Failed to initialize cryptographic data digest structures. This was not supposed to happen!\n\nI cannot do much without those so app will now close.
Master ended session, see you next time!
Inconsistent data detected. Proceeding will only make the problem worse. Please report this and maybe we\'ll be able to recover your data.
No playing characters given to you.
Every party needs a name.\nYour friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve.
A party with the same name already exists. Names must be unique.
You are creating an empty party.
Forming a party with %1$d client devices.
At least one connected device couldn\'t get in the party.
Tap devices to let them in the party.
We\'re almost done. Check all the playing characters are defined and accepted.
Define as many characters as you want. The process will complete when Master decides so.
Lost connection to Master device. This is a fatal error and cannot be currently recovered.
Master is starting a new session right away! See you there!
Character \"%1$s\" was rejected. You can modify something and retry.
Parties generated and stored on this device. You have full control and you can start games.
This device holds a key allowing you to join games as a player.
Tap on a party overview to show information and actions here.
I am rewriting storage data so I cannot let you go away. By the time you have read this, I\'ve hopefully finished. Try again.
Errors detected in session data. In the future I might be able to fix this but for the time being there\'s nothing I can do. To protect the data, I will now take you back to main menu.
Give up and go main menu
No playing characters in party. There\'s no way to make a game so I\'m doing nothing.\nAdd at least one playing character.
Could not publish service. Explicit connections are still available.
Cannot stop publishing. Odd. Perhaps trying again will fix that.
All playing characters assigned. Ready to go.
No playing characters on this device.
Something went wrong while giving out data. This is very wrong and state is now likely inconsistent. Please report this issue.
Port is valid for all addresses.
Port not currently open.\nNo connections available.
You will advance to character selection as soon as I can connect to the Master device.
Pulling character data from Master device…
Cannot explore network. You must use an explicit connection.
Found a party there but it is still being formed. I\'m ignoring it.
Found party \"%1$s\". It is not the one we\'re looking for. I suggest to forget about this party but if you want I can try to join anyway (I\'ll most likely fail).
One character played on another device.
Your ownership change request for \"%1$s\" was refused.
Character \"%1$s\" will be played on another device.
The party is now playing, but looks like you have been given no characters! Nothing to do.
You can swipe those away to give up a character. They will not be deleted.
Tap to request to play here.
Requested to be played on this device
One character has not been assigned.

%1$s
To continue, all characters must be played by someone.

Long press an unassigned character for some options.
Hidden devices are listed below. You can restore them to view or disconnect them. Both operations require care!
Names must have at least one character.
Device names are visible only from this device.
Messages exceeding this length will not be shown.\nPlaying characters have their separate budget.
session file takes %1$d, maximum size allowed is %2$d
I will switch to battle as soon as I can figure out an order of initiative.\nFor the time being, you must wait.
Select everyone taking part in next battle.
At least one playing character required.
You need at least two actors to fight.
Someone will not take part to battle. Is that what you intended?\nSurprise round is be managed later.
Session data will be saved but players will have to reconnect and assign characters again.
Actors without tick will skip round.\nUse this for surprise rounds!
%1$s has a readied action. You can renew the prepared action or discard it.
Renew prepared action and go next
Not fighting yet!\nInitiative order as shown.
Hit point tracking is TODO so you\'ll have to disable defeated mobs manually.
There\'s no going back! Battle order and monster status will be discarded.
You can suspend battle or simply discard. If you discard you won\'t distribute XPs. Anyway, battle effects already applied will stay.
Not much you can do here for the time being, maybe something interesting in the future.\nJust do what you want, then pass turn to next.
I cannot let you do that. You have been given a turn to play, you will act. You can get out only by passing to next player.
Waiting turn.\nDevice will vibrate when your attention is required.
One does not simply get outta there. You are connected to master device, if you go away stuff might go awry for other players.
Roll dice and enter result.\nModifier (%1$s) applied automatically.
Select the monsters to compute their XP awards.
Now select the PCs receiving experience.
If you go back, you will throw away XPs. The proper way to do that is to consume all monsters.

You can swipe away this note.
Those devices have a key to join game.\nNeed to add a device? Hit the menu ︙
\"%1$s\" exists but it\'s not a directory.
Sorry to know it isn\'t working!\nNetwork exploration works only in certain conditions.
You need to be in Wi-Fi range and master device must be in "accept connection" mode.
2. Is the party being assembled right now?
Party creation is special: it will let new devices in and distribute them special keys for automated login at later time.
2. Are you sure you are in the party?

Once the party is assembled every device gets a special key. This key is used to identify each device and assign its settings. If this device does not hold a key, then Master needs to give it one. He can do so by the \"party picker\", there\'s a special menu option.
3. Are you on the same network?

Because of how the thing works, I can only find parties in the same Wi-Fi network. You can ensure to be on the same network by using tethering. You will need to ask Master to enable it on his/her device, connect to it and restart the app.

Still not working? I want to make this work! Please get in touch with support and we'll sort it out!
collaborativegrouporder@gmail.com
https://www.reddit.com/r/app_cgo
In the meanwhile you can also go back and try an explicit connection, you will find it in the menu options.
Players will now have a chance to modify their characters. You will be presented those new proposals in adventuring mode for your approval.
